text: John Eldon Zook (September 24, 1947 â€“ June 6, 2020) was an American professional football player. He was born in Garden City, Kansas. He was a defensive end for 12 seasons in the National Football League (NFL). He played for the St. Louis Cardinals and the Atlanta Falcons. Zook played college football for the University of Kansas. Zook died on June 6, 2020 in Wichita, Kansas at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American football defensive ends Category:Los Angeles Rams players Category:Atlanta Falcons players Category:Sportspeople from Kansas
title: John Zook
